Class MButton

All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.accessibility.Accessible, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
HiddencardPanel
public class MButton
extends MPanel

Class MButton represents a button that is drawing different images corresponding to its state. States are inherited from class MPanel.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Till Zoppke
See Also:
Serialized Form

Constructor Detail

MButton

public MButton(int id,
               java.awt.Image[] images)
Constructor.
Parameters:
id - an int to identify this MButton.
images - an array of Image, size 5. They correspond to 5 possible states defined by class MPanel.

MButton

public MButton(java.awt.Image[] images,
               int id,
               int x,
               int y)
Constructor.
Parameters:
images - an array of Image, size 5. They correspond to 5 possible states defined by class MPanel.
id - an int to identify this MButton.
x - an int as x-coordinate of the upper-left corner for the image
y - an int as y-coordinate of the upper-left corner for the image
